name: Flip The Die
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022!

A short 2D puzzle game where you roll dice and coins to specific sides

I kinda ran out of time in the middle of doing sound effects pls forgive me

The game has no music so please put on some music in the background and pretend i wrote it!

- Controls:

  • W,A,S,D - Move
  • Backspace - Undo (As the game will tell you)
  • R - Restart level (As the game probably should have told you)
